synopsis.text: In a technologically advanced near future, tensions are escalating between Japan and China. Humanity's crowning aquatic achievement is Ocean Techno Polis - an enormous artificial floating city built as a monument to engineering and innovation. However, this futuristic metropolis harbors undisclosed military secrets. When a mysterious force suddenly destroys Ocean Techno Polis, engineer Kurase finds himself fighting desperately against time to save his visiting ex-wife and daughter trapped in the wreckage below. As Kurase races toward the sinking city, he becomes entangled in the hidden agenda of a nearby Japanese naval submarine. With the submarine crew's cooperation uncertain, Kurase must uncover why Ocean Techno Polis was attacked and destroyed before it's too late. This thrilling story promises action, mystery, family bonds, and the ominous threat of war looming over technological marvels. As secrets surface from the ocean depths, humanity's ingenuity is pit against its capacity for self-destruction.
